1676280.name: Metasweeper
1676280.description:
Metasweeper will take some time yet to complete, but I'm super excited to see where it goes. Making this game already has surprised me numerous times with where the game wants to go, each time reaching a whole new level of delight. Stick around for the ride why don't you?

Notable Features So Far

  • Interactive tutorial for those that don't quite remember how minesweeper works.
  • Generous abilities that allow you to gently ramp up the minesweeper difficulty as you explore.
  • Goes way beyond the mechanics of minesweeper, while still remaining true to that flagging and clearing core.
  • Puzzle sections that make you a better minesweeper player.
  • It's a Zelda-like so of course it has bombs!
